Hi, my name is

Michaela Moritz

HTML/CSS/SCSS/Bootstrap/basic Javascript Dev

About Me

Everything you see on this website is my work. I learned HTML/CSS/SCSS/Bootstrap solely on my own; thus, if you're interested in a dedicated coder who enjoys her work, you've found the right person! I love coding, I'm eager to learn more stuff, and I'm responsible and loyal.

I have always been interested in programming and coding, but my life has unfolded differently. I became a horse racing expert, a copywriter, and a writer of stories in general. Yet, when I had enough spare time, I delved deep into the world of coding. I efficiently handled HTML and CSS, upon which I added SCSS and Bootstrap to my arsenal of skills.

In terms of Javascript, I easily handle simple tasks, but I enjoy consulting more complicated stuff with the internet as I always seek the most efficient method. The same goes for Bootstrap, as I know the basics, but I feel the best way to work with it is by picking the most suitable option from the source. Why work hard when you can work easily and quickly?

I am pretty cunning and diligent, so whenever I encounter an error, I won't have peace until I figure it out. Moreover, I am reliable, loyal, and inventive, which makes me a great asset to any team.

In case you're interested in my other skills, visit my

Portfolio

Simple Web

Do you like what you see? All the code I used for making this site is mine, plus I used pictures from Unsplash and adhered to the theory of colors. I can also work with the photos you provide and the color palette you prefer. Delivering such a simple layout is a matter of a few days. Including a javascript file with a code for disabling/enabling the mobile menu is a sure thing.

Elevate your online presence with my coding prowess!

HTML/CSS from Figma/Photoshop

When practicing my coding skills, this was my favorite part of it. I would utterly enjoy transferring your elaborate designs into HTML and CSS (SCSS/Bootstrap) code, as it's always thrilling to see the code bringing designs to life.

Responsiveness

All my work comes together with breakpoints; in other words, all websites I work on are responsive on every device. If you prefer me to prioritize either the mobile or web version, just say so, and I'll start with coding, bearing your preference in mind.

For all my coding, I use VSCode.

Pricing depends on the scale of your project

Let's bridge the gap between design and functionality, turning your dreams into a captivating digital presence.
